name: Space Maze: Trapped in Space
description:
Space Maze: Trapped in Space is my entry for #lowrezjam2020. Its a short platformer which turned out much simpler than some of my earlier ideas. A lot of the game was actually made in the last two days of the jam.

You wake up to find the space station evacuated due to strong solar winds. Collect oxygen tanks while searching for batteries to power the elevator.

Note that the rocket boots are scarce and are used when you pick them up. Only do so when you are sure there is no other way to proceed.

CONTROLS:
Movement - Arrow keys
Interact - Control
Jump - Space
Walk - Shift
View scale - F5
Fullscreen - F11
Music - F7
Close game - Esc

CREDITS:
Creator: Benjamin D.
Engine: GameMaker: Studio 1.4
Sprite Editors: Graphics Gale, mspaint, Piskel, Paint.net
Font: Pixeltype by TheJman0205
Music: Amulets - Lucid Haze
Sounds effects: from freesound.org: jacksonacademyashmore, LittleRobotSoundFactory, Sergenious, slamaxu, deleted_user_877451
